Experiments¶

This module is responsible for all experiments/fits

The experiments module contains the fitting models and the setups (assembled reading routines) for different experimental setups. Furthermore, it contains a set of plotting libraries.

mfm.experiments.get_data(curve_type: 'str' = 'experiment', data_set: 'List[data.ExperimentalData]' = None) → 'List[data.ExperimentalData]'[source]¶

Returns all curves mfm.curve.DataCurve except if the curve is names “Global-fit”

Return type

List[ExperimentalData]

Models¶

This module is responsible contains all fitting modules for experimental data

The models

  1. models.tcspc

  2. models.fcs

  3. models.global_model

  4. models.parse

  5. models.proteinMC

  6. models.stopped_flow

Time-resolved fluorescence¶

This module contains all time-resolved fluorescence models (TCSPC)

class mfm.models.tcspc.pddem.PDDEM(**kwargs)[source]¶
property fAB¶
Returns

float probability of energy-transfer from A to B

property fABBA¶
Returns

array probability of energy-transfer from (A to B), (B to A)

property fBA¶
Returns

float probability of energy-transfer from B to A

property pm¶
Returns

array Emission probability of flurophore (A, B)

property pmA¶
Returns

float Emission probability of flurophore A

property pmB¶
Returns

float Emission probability of flurophore B

property pureA¶
Returns

float fraction of decay A in total decay

property pureAB¶
Returns

array fraction of decay (A, B) in total decay

property pureB¶
Returns

float fraction of decay B in total decay

property px¶
Returns

numpy-array Exciation probabilities of flurophore (A, B)

property pxA¶
Returns

float Excitation probability of fluorphore A

property pxB¶
Returns

float Excitation probability of fluorphore B

class mfm.models.tcspc.pddem.PDDEMModel(fit, **kwargs)[source]¶

Kalinin, S., and Johansson, L.B. Energy Migration and Transfer Rates are Invariant to Modeling the Fluorescence Relaxation by Discrete and Continuous Distributions of Lifetimes. J. Phys. Chem. B, 108 (2004) 3092-3097.
